subject: Order not shipped
description_text:
Hello,

I recently purchased a handbrake and a set of pedals from simsonn, i
received the handbrake within 15 days. The pedals are as i can see on your
site, still not shipped.
Its been 25 days from when the order was confirmed and with eco shipping it
should have already been deliverd.

When are my pedals going to be shipped?

Its order #SSN5360

Thanks,

Job Westmijse

conversations.body_text: Hi Job Westmijse,  ​Regarding your pedal:  ​We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
